titles.title: Karunan - erparachitivi sainyamula - కరుణన్ - ఏర్పరచితివి సైన్యముల

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Karunan erparachitivi sainyamula Yehova nan parishuddudaa kristulo erigitivi karunan{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Moshenu korukoni chesitivi naayakuni Goshenu nundi ellan nadupa osagitivi yavasaratalanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yakobun korukoni Eshaavunu vidichitivi Sakalambou kastamulanosagi Ishraayelanu perunu itchitivi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Solomonun korukoni ila sakala gnaanamide Aalaya nirmaana krupanidenu paalimpa raajyambosagenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Daaniyelunu korukoni thana paraloka jnaanamide Ennenno darshanamula nosagi kanupapaga kaapaadenila{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jerubbaabelun korukoni mudrayungaramuga jesen Niraminchenu prabhuni alayamun virivaina irukulayandu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
v7
